content: There’s a landmine buried in a footnote on the last page of Digital Realty’s newly filed reply brief in the U.S. Supreme Court case that will determine the scope of Dodd-Frank anti-retaliation protections for corporate whistleblowers. And if the justices step on it  they could blow up administrative law as it’s currently practiced.
name: Digital Realty Trust Inc
title: Chevron deference landmine lurks in new brief in SCOTUS whistleblower case

content: TOKYO Japanese trading house Mitsubishi Corp  plans to set up a joint venture with U.S. data center operator Digital Realty Trust  and build around 10 data centers in Japan by 2022 for 200 billion yen ($1.8 billion)  the Nikkei said on Saturday.
name: Digital Realty Trust Inc
title: Japan's Mitsubishi  U.S. partner to invest $1.8 billion in data centers: media

content: TOKYO  Oct 21 Japanese trading house Mitsubishi Corp plans to set up a joint venture with U.S. data centre operator Digital Realty Trust and build around 10 data centres in Japan by 2022 for 200 billion yen ($1.8 billion)  the Nikkei said on Saturday.
name: Digital Realty Trust Inc
title: Japan's Mitsubishi  U.S. partner to invest $1.8 bln in data centres -media

content: July 13 Digital Realty Trust Inc said it would buy private equity owned Telx Group Inc in a deal valued at about $1.89 billion to double its footprint in the rapidly growing business of renting out space to companies to run their data centers.
name: Digital Realty Trust Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Data center company Digital Realty to buy Telx in $1.89 bln deal

content: July 13 Digital Realty Trust Inc  a real estate investment trust that rents out space to companies for setting up data centers  said it would buy Telx Group Inc from its private equity owners in a deal valued at about $1.89 billion.
name: Digital Realty Trust Inc
title: Digital Realty to buy Telx in $1.89 bln deal
